com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.control

Class MockEc2Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.control.MockEc2Controller

  • public final class MockEc2Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class providing static methods for managing life cycle of mock ec2 instances. The current implementations can:
    • run
    • stop
    • terminate
    • describe
    mock ec2 instances only.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MockEc2Controller getInstance()
        Returns:
        singleton instance of MockEc2Controller

      • describeInstances

        public java.util.Collection<MockEc2Instance> describeInstances(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> instanceIDs)
        List mock ec2 instances in current aws-mock.
        Parameters:
        instanceIDs - a filter of specified instance IDs for the target instance to describe
        Returns:
        a collection of MockEc2Instance with specifed instance IDs, or all of the mock ec2 instances if no instance IDs as filtered

      • runInstances

        public <T extends MockEc2Instance> java.util.List<T> runInstances(java.lang.Class<? extends T> clazz,
                                                         java.lang.String imageId,
                                                         java.lang.String instanceTypeName,
                                                         int minCount,
                                                         int maxCount)
        Create and run mock ec2 instances.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The template type of class as concrete type of mock ec2 instance to run as, should extend MockEc2Instance, matching the clazz parameter
        Parameters:
        clazz - class as concrete type of mock ec2 instance to run as, should extend MockEc2Instance
        imageId - AMI of new mock ec2 instance(s)
        instanceTypeName - type(scale) name of new mock ec2 instance(s), refer to MockEc2Instance#InstanceType
        minCount - max count of instances to run (but limited to MAX_RUN_INSTANCE_COUNT_AT_A_TIME)
        maxCount - min count of instances to run (should larger than 0)
        Returns:
        a list of objects of clazz as started new mock ec2 instances

      • startInstances

        public java.util.List<com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.cxf_generated.InstanceStateChangeType> startInstances(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> instanceIDs)
        Start one or more existing mock ec2 instances.
        Parameters:
        instanceIDs - a set of instance IDs for those instances to start
        Returns:
        a list of state change messages (typically stopped to running)

      • stopInstances

        public java.util.List<com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.cxf_generated.InstanceStateChangeType> stopInstances(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> instanceIDs)
        Stop one or more existing mock ec2 instances.
        Parameters:
        instanceIDs - a set of instance IDs for those instances to stop
        Returns:
        a list of state change messages (typically running to stopping)

        public java.util.List<com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.cxf_generated.InstanceStateChangeType> terminateInstances(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> instanceIDs)
        Terminate one or more existing mock ec2 instances.
        Parameters:
        instanceIDs - a set of instance IDs for those instances to terminate
        Returns:
        a list of state change messages (typically running/stopped to terminated)
